item.description:
For info ClicK HERE

Lauren will not be able to host but you can host this yourselves! Just print out a meetup sign and bring it with you so you can find each other.

Direction: Take the T to the Park Street Station Stop (RED LINE & GREEN Line). When you exist the station, walk inside the Boston Common down Tremont Street . Just behind the T station at Park Street entrance / exist on Tremont Street,  you will come to the Visitor Information Building (or ask anyone where it is)..a small one story building, which will be closed after 5PM. Gather right in front of the Visitor Information building.
item.how_to_find_us: Gather in front of the Visitor Information Building on the Boston Common Tremont Street BRING A MEETUP SIGN!!!

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Christmas Tree LIGHTING Cermony & Free Concert on the Boston Common
